title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A cyborg protects John Connor from a more advanced cyborg sent to kill him.

title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly travels back in time in a DeLorean invented by Doc Brown.

title: The Terminator
description: A cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to kill a woman whose unborn son is key to humanity's future.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: Humanity discovers a mysterious object on the Moon and embarks on a quest with H.A.L. 9000.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A paleontologist protects kids after dinosaurs escape in a theme park.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max aids a woman rebelling against a tyrant.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts struggle to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A boy hides an alien and forms a bond while a task force hunts it.

title: Moon
description: An astronaut faces a personal crisis near the end of his lunar mission.

title: Annihilation
description: A biologist explores a mysterious zone where the laws of nature are altered.

title: Tenet
description: A Protagonist navigates espionage and time inversion to save the world.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: A woman explores alternate universes to save existence.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the atomic bomb's development.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: Luke Skywalker trains with Yoda while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

title: Star Wars
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces to save the galaxy from the Empire's battle station.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to seek revenge and secure his destiny.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner hunts replicants who have returned to Earth.

title: Aliens
description: Ripley returns to confront the Alien after 57 years in hypersleep.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides travels to the dangerous planet harboring a valuable resource.

title: Alien
description: A spacecraft crew encounters a deadly lifeform after a mysterious transmission.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works to communicate with aliens after spacecraft appear worldwide.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians engage in a lifelong rivalry filled with obsession and deceit.

title: Ex Machina
description: A programmer evaluates the human qualities of an advanced humanoid A.I.

title: Children of Men
description: In a world where women are infertile, a man protects a miraculously pregnant woman.

title: District 9
description: Aliens are confined to a South African slum, and a company seeks their technology.

title: The Fifth Element
description: A cab driver becomes central in a search for a cosmic weapon to stop Evil.

title: Metropolis
description: In a futuristic city, a worker's son and a prophet seek to bridge class divides.

title: Edge of Tomorrow
description: A soldier relives the same day to fight aliens, restarting with each death.

title: Minority Report
description: A cop in a future where crimes are predicted is accused of a future murder.

title: Predator
description: Commandos in a jungle are hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: Donnie Darko
description: A teenager is told by a demonic rabbit that the world will end in 28 days.

title: Ghost in the Shell
description: A cyber-enhanced soldier stops dangerous criminals in a futuristic world.

title: Akira
description: A biker gains psychic powers, threatening Neo-Tokyo, stopped by teens and psychics.

title: Solaris
description: A psychologist investigates a crew on a station orbiting a strange planet.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
description: An alien demands Earth live peacefully or face destruction.

title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
description: A man follows psychic clues to meet extraterrestrial visitors.

title: The Thing
description: Scientists in Antarctica face a shape-shifting alien that mimics its victims.

title: RoboCop
description: A wounded cop becomes a cyborg in a crime-ridden Detroit.

title: Total Recall
description: A manâ€™s implanted Mars vacation memories lead to a real, dangerous adventure.

title: Gattaca
description: A genetically inferior man assumes a new identity to pursue space travel.

title: Contact
description: A scientist finds proof of alien intelligence and decodes a mysterious machine.

title: Her
description: A writer forms a relationship with an advanced operating system.

title: Upgrade
description: A technophobe seeks revenge with an experimental AI implant.

title: Ad Astra
description: An astronaut searches for his missing father, whose expedition threatens the universe.

title: Poor Things
description: A revived woman embarks on an adventure for equality and liberation.

title: The Creator
description: A soldier finds a child-like robot in a war between humans and AI.
